cold.notes: Available at City Clinic, Raipur. General consultation for common illnesses.

common cold.notes: Available at City Clinic, Raipur. General consultation for common illnesses.

cough.notes: Consult if cough persists for more than a week or is severe. HealthHub Polyclinic.

diabetes.notes: Specializes in diabetes management. Located at Apollo Hospital, Raipur.
Specializes in diabetes management. Located at Apollo Hospital, Raipur.

hypertension.notes: Manages high blood pressure and related heart conditions. CareFirst Hospital.

arthritis.notes: Expert in joint pain and autoimmune diseases. Rheumatology Center, Raipur.

osteoarthristis.notes: Joint specialist. Rheumatology Center or consult Orthopedics at major hospitals.

migraine.notes: Consult for diagnosis and management of severe or frequent headaches. NeuroLife Clinic.

malaria.notes: Requires immediate medical attention. Visit nearest hospital or GP.

dengue.notes: Requires immediate medical attention. Monitor platelet count. Visit nearest hospital or GP.

typhoid.notes: Requires diagnosis and antibiotic treatment. Visit nearest hospital or GP.

pneumonia.notes: Requires medical evaluation and likely antibiotics. HealthHub Polyclinic or hospital.

gastroenteritis.notes: Focus on hydration. Consult if symptoms are severe or persistent. City Clinic, Raipur.

jaundice.notes: Requires investigation into the underlying cause. GastroCare Center, Raipur.

hepatitis a.notes: Usually self-limiting, consult for monitoring. GastroCare Center, Raipur.

hepatitis b.notes: Requires specialist management. GastroCare Center, Raipur.

hepatitis c.notes: Requires specialist management. GastroCare Center, Raipur.

hepatitis d.notes: Requires specialist management (linked to Hep B). GastroCare Center, Raipur.

hepatitis e.notes: Consult for monitoring, especially if pregnant. GastroCare Center, Raipur.

heart attack.notes: Medical emergency requiring immediate hospital visit. Time is critical.

allergy.notes: For persistent or severe allergies. Allergy & Asthma Clinic, Raipur.

urinary tract infection.doctor_name: Dr. Anjali Sharma / Dr. Ashok Kumar
urinary tract infection.notes: Requires diagnosis and antibiotics. Consult GP first, Urologist (Dr. Kumar) if recurrent.

_default_.notes: Generally available for most conditions. For specific issues, consult a specialist which is available in  Ramkrishna Hospital, Raipur.
